trans-unit.source: EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT Messaging (Business to Business)
trans-unit.target: EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT Messaging (Business to Business)

trans-unit.source: In today’s world, to be successful as a business, enterprises must effectively manage data received from other organizations such as vendors and business partners.
trans-unit.target: In today’s world, to be successful as a business, enterprises must effectively manage data received from other organizations such as vendors and business partners.

trans-unit.source: Data received from partner organizations is often categorized as business-to-business (B2B) data transfer.
trans-unit.target: Data received from partner organizations is often categorized as business-to-business (B2B) data transfer.

trans-unit.source: One of the standard and most commonly used protocols for B2B and EDI is X12.
trans-unit.target: One of the standard and most commonly used protocols for B2B and EDI is X12.

trans-unit.source: There are various solutions available that help you manage and process EDI data transfer.
trans-unit.target: There are various solutions available that help you manage and process EDI data transfer.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> provides a <token>tpm_portal</token> that enables you to manage your trading partners and B2B messaging.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> provides a <token>tpm_portal</token> that enables you to manage your trading partners and B2B messaging.

trans-unit.source: The <token>tpm_full</token> enables service providers to add trading partners and configure agreements that can be deployed to <token>azure_1</token>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>tpm_full</token> enables service providers to add trading partners and configure agreements that can be deployed to <token>azure_1</token>.

trans-unit.source: The trading partners can then be send X12 messages using HTTP, AS2, FTP/S, and SFTP as transports.
trans-unit.target: The trading partners can then be send X12 messages using HTTP, AS2, FTP/S, and SFTP as transports.

trans-unit.source: Once the message is received, it will be processed by the B2B pipeline deployed on <token>azure_1</token> and is routed to the destination configured as part of the agreement.
trans-unit.target: Once the message is received, it will be processed by the B2B pipeline deployed on <token>azure_1</token> and is routed to the destination configured as part of the agreement.

trans-unit.source: Before you can use the <token>tpm_portal</token> for B2B messaging with your trading partners, you must register your <token>af_integration</token> subscription with the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: Before you can use the <token>tpm_portal</token> for B2B messaging with your trading partners, you must register your <token>af_integration</token> subscription with the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="7c9bae82-8d07-45df-bf51-b0b31417a9d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Registering and Updating a BizTalk Service Deployment on the BizTalk Services Portal</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="7c9bae82-8d07-45df-bf51-b0b31417a9d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Registering and Updating a BizTalk Service Deployment on the BizTalk Services Portal</link>.
